content: अनुबुध् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> To awake, to recollect; learn, obtain information of, know, be aware of; न सत्यमनुबुध्यते <ls>K. 104</ls> does not perceive or recognise. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To remind, put in mind of; अये सम्यगनुबोधितोऽस्मि <ls>Ś. 1</ls> well reminded. {@--2@} To advise, inform; इति शिष्येण किलान्वबोधयत् <ls>R. 8. 75.</ls>
